pages.title: Enchanter's Eye
pages.description: A caster tool that can cast inscribed spells remotely through a Scry Crystal. Use the eye on a Scry Crystal to bind the location, or hold a bound Scry Parchment in the offhand. Spells will be cast through the eye similar to a Spell Turret, but you are considered the caster for all effects. Useful for remote teleportation or item movement.
